content.text:
Alice: Hey, Mark! Have you finished your homework?
Mark: No, I haven't. How about you?
Alice: Yes I did yesterday. You can work on it during lunch break. Would you like some help?
Mark: Thanks, Alice. That would be great. I could use some help with the math problems.
Alice: Sure! I can explain the concepts to you. We can meet in the library after our last class. How about that?
Mark: Sounds good. I may have some questions about the assignment. How about you?
Alice: I have no problem. We can go through the questions together. By the way, can you lend me your eraser? I forgot mine at home.
Mark: Sure here you go.
Alice: Thanks.
